text: @jfagone @roselesliej I live in Iowa and agree this is dumb - what we COULD use here though is a Governor with a damn spine that isn't owned by Charles Koch and his efforts to prevent Shelter in Place orders *Stares Hard at Governor @KimReynoldsIA* put #PeopleOverProfit - dammit. #COVID19
